de.hlu.ust
Class Finance

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Finance
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Account, BankAccount, BankStatement, Booking
public abstract class Finance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The base class for Account,BankAccountand Booking.

It stores:

  • an internal identifier,
  • the creating or last changing date and time,
  • the creating or last changing user name and
  • the value added tax percent value.
It defines the following account types:
  • IN,
  • OUT,
  • NEUTRAL,
  • PREVAT,
  • IN_CASH_BOX and
  • OUT_CASH_BOX.

See Also:
Serialized Form

cfs

public static java.lang.String cfs(java.lang.String str)
Prepare a Stringfor file storage.

Append at least one space to the possible empty string fields to fight against StringTokenizercannot have empty fields.

Replace all occurences of '|' whith an space, because it is used as field separator.

Parameters:
str - The input String.
Returns:
A new String.
See Also:
sfc(String)

sfc

public static java.lang.String sfc(java.lang.String str)
Get an Stringfrom the file storage.

Removing single spaces (they are inserted for the StringTokenizer).

Parameters:
str - The input String.
Returns:
An empty string or the given string..
See Also:
cfs(String)
